title: Vehicle Breakdown and Mechanical Emergencies
description: Essential communication for handling vehicle problems during service

emergencyPhrases.english: I need to pull over immediately

emergencyPhrases.spanish: Estoy llamando a asistencia en carretera
emergencyPhrases.pronunciation: es-TOY yah-MAN-doh ah ah-sees-TEN-see-ah en kah-reh-TEH-rah

emergencyPhrases.english: I apologize, but I cannot continue this trip
emergencyPhrases.spanish: Disculpe, pero no puedo continuar este viaje
emergencyPhrases.pronunciation: dees-KOOL-peh, PEH-roh noh PWEH-doh kon-tee-noo-AR ES-teh vee-AH-heh

emergencyPhrases.english: You won't be charged for this trip
emergencyPhrases.spanish: No se le cobrará por este viaje

immediateSteps.details: Get off highway if possible. Hard shoulder if no other option. Turn on hazard lights immediately
Explain situation calmly. Apologize for inconvenience. Estimate resolution time if known
Use app to report breakdown. Platform will handle customer rebooking and refund
Insurance, AAA, or platform-provided assistance. Give exact location
Platform should provide replacement ride. Offer to help passenger request one

communicationScript.customer: Disculpe, tengo una llanta ponchada. Necesito detenerme de forma segura. (Sorry, I have a flat tire. I need to pull over safely.)
communicationScript.platform: Reportando llanta ponchada en [ubicación]. Necesito asistencia. (Reporting flat tire at [location]. Need assistance.)
communicationScript.roadsideAssistance: Tengo una llanta ponchada en [ubicación exacta]. Necesito cambio de llanta o grúa. (I have a flat tire at [exact location]. Need tire change or tow.)

flatTire.safetyNotes: Do not attempt to change tire on highway. Move to safe location first. Use hazard lights and reflective triangles if you have them

deadBattery.spanish: La batería no arranca el vehículo

communicationScript.customer: Lo siento mucho, mi batería está muerta y el vehículo no arranca. Voy a llamar ayuda. (I'm very sorry, my battery is dead and the vehicle won't start. I'm calling for help.)
communicationScript.platform: Mi vehículo no arranca por batería muerta. Necesito cancelar viaje activo. (My vehicle won't start due to dead battery. Need to cancel active trip.)
communicationScript.roadsideAssistance: Necesito un jump start. Mi batería está muerta en [ubicación]. (I need a jump start. My battery is dead at [location].)

deadBattery.prevention: Have jumper cables in car. Know location of nearby auto parts stores. Consider portable jump starter

communicationScript.customer: Disculpe, mi motor se está sobrecalentando. Por seguridad, debo detenerme ahora. (Sorry, my engine is overheating. For safety, I must stop now.)
communicationScript.warning: NEVER open radiator cap when hot - can cause serious burns

overheating.safetyNotes: Pull over immediately. Turn off AC, turn on heat to pull heat from engine. Let engine cool before checking coolant

communicationScript.customer: Disculpe mi error, me estoy quedando sin gasolina. Necesito parar en una gasolinera inmediatamente. (Sorry for my mistake, I'm running out of gas. I need to stop at a gas station immediately.)
communicationScript.prevention: This is preventable - check gas before starting shifts. Keep tank above 1/4 full

outOfGas.professionalNote: This reflects poorly on professionalism. Always maintain adequate fuel

checkEngineLight.spanish: Se enciende la luz del motor

communicationScript.assessment: If light is steady (not flashing), usually can continue trip carefully and check after. If flashing, pull over immediately - serious problem

apologize.english: I sincerely apologize for this mechanical issue

reassure.english: The platform will arrange another ride for you at no charge
